description:
Shou is a trans man. He was working for Shuichi Wagatsuma at the bar before he met Kengo`s older sister Mayu and fell in love with her. Not knowing Shou was trans, Mayu falls for him too, but after realizing it, she suddenly dumps him. Turning into a shadow monster, he becomes a trouble for everyone.
Shouko then inspired by the words of Aya and release the monster within her.
Source: MyAnimeList
name: Shouko Mikami
